description: Detects use of executionpolicy option to set a unsecure policies Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Change PowerShell Policies to an Unsecure Level
query: (process.command_line:(*\ \-executionpolicy\ * OR *\ \-ep\ * OR *\ \-exec\ *) AND process.command_line:(*Unrestricted* OR *bypass* OR *RemoteSigned*))
